markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Agile" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=170" />
<trait label="Deadly d6" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=174" />
<trait label="Finesse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=179" />
<trait label="Thrown 20 ft." url="/Traits.aspx?ID=195" />
<trait label="Versatile S" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=200" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 281 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Favored Weapon** [Black Butterfly](/Deities.aspx?ID=115), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=215), [Cosmic Caravan](/Deities.aspx?ID=219), [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Ma'at](/Deities.aspx?ID=55), [The Endless Road](/Deities.aspx?ID=246), [The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213)

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 2 gp

**Damage** 1d4 P

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Category** Martial

**Group** [Knife](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=9)
</row>

</column>

---

From a central metal ring, four tapering metal blades extend like points on a compass rose. When gripping a starknife from the center, the wielder can use it as a melee weapon. It can also be thrown short distances.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-9" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Weapons</title>
[Eclipse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=503), [Guiding Star](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1059)
name: Starknife

When gripping a starknife from the center, the wielder can use it as a melee weapon. It can also be thrown short distances.
